body_html:
TensorFlow on windows needs at least Visual Studio 2015, due to required C++11 support.
You will need to upgrade visual studio otherwise you wont be able to compile TF on your system.

You can find some more information here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md

TensorFlow on windows needs at least Visual Studio 2015, due to required C++11 support.

You can find some more information here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md
body:
TensorFlow on windows needs at least Visual Studio 2015, due to required C++11 support.
You will need to upgrade visual studio otherwise you wont be able to compile TF on your system.

You can find some more information here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/README.md
